H0.text: To make sugar in the leaves is how the tomato plants use sunlight when the class places the planters by the window to allow the plants to receive more light.

H1.text: To use starch from the stems, the tomato plants use sunlight, a benefit of the class placing planters by the window to provide more sunlight.

H2.text: To move water to the flowers is how the tomato plants use sunlight, as the class puts the planters by the window so the plants can get more sunlight.

H3.text: Tomato plants use sunlight to get nutrients through the roots.
